content.question: What is the length of the curve <math alttext="y equals, 1 minus cosine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> from <math alttext="x equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="x equals 4 pi" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

topic.text: 8.13: (BC ONLY) The Arc Length of a Smooth, Planar Curve and Distance Traveled
